name: Jumpi Ball
description:
Just a small little game that's totally not a ripoff of flappy bird

This game is recommended to be played in pc cuz there is no support for mobile but that will be changed in the future.

But enjoy this small game :)

If you get far on this game by luck and skill, I want to know how far you get.

Tell me how far you got on Jumpi Ball with videos for proof, thanks :)
